definition: completely different
footpath/track/diameter/straight/directly
main hall/front courtyard/law court
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart

sentences.english: These nationalisms, or tribalisms vary widely.
sentences.chinese: 这些民族主义或部落主义大相径庭。

sentences.english: But learning to live with his "paralysis" wasn't the same as resigning himself to it.
sentences.chinese: 但是学会生活在瘫痪中与接受瘫痪这个现实相去径庭。

sentences.english: But depending on the unit chosen, the associational networks will differ.
sentences.chinese: 选择不同的基本单位，这种联系也大相径庭。

sentences.english: While this is true in principle, it is very different in practice.
sentences.chinese: 然而，虽然原则上来说这是真的，实际上却大相径庭。

sentences.english: Our views are diametrically opposed on this issue.
sentences.chinese: 在这个问题上，我们的观点大相径庭。

sentences.english: However, for the beauty of expression that people are different and very different.
sentences.chinese: 可是人们对于爱美的表达方式却千差万别，大相径庭。

sentences.english: My sister Mimi and I are opposite in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 我和姐姐Mimi在很多方面大相径庭。

sentences.english: This is a long way from Broom.
sentences.chinese: 和《扫帚》的创立宗旨大相径庭。

sentences.english: All those pink and green shapes bore little resemblance to the real world in which she lived.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些粉红的和绿的图形与她居住的世界大相径庭。

sentences.english: But this is very different from Hobbes' sovereign.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这与霍布斯的论述是大相径庭的。

sentences.english: But the truth seems to prove that my imagine is not correct.
sentences.chinese: 但似乎事实跟我的想象不相径庭。

sentences.english: Has been to New York than the hustle and bustle of downtown New York is very different.
sentences.chinese: 也曾去过纽约，比起纽约的喧闹繁华是大相径庭。

sentences.english: In every respect, the war today in Afghanistan is dramatically different.
sentences.chinese: 在每个方面，现在的阿富汗战争都大相径庭。

sentences.english: But what the economy required was at odds with a necessary epiphany.
sentences.chinese: 但是经济所要求的与我们必要的顿悟大相径庭。

sentences.english: These constructs can vary greatly depending on the business requirements.
sentences.chinese: 这些构造可以根据业务需求而大相径庭。

sentences.english: History, too, is read differently on either side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 这条线两边的人对历史的解读也大相径庭。

definition: as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
not at all the same/substantially different
very different
to be precisely the same/to be no different
lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
as different as heaven and earth (idiom)/worlds apart
widely different/utterly different
poles apart (idiom)/entirely different
entirely different/different as black and white
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
totally different
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: a complete contrast/totally different
each has its own merits (idiom)
manifold diversity
to act in a way that defeats one's purpose (idiom)
